name: Bad Cube
description:
Bad Cube is a puzzle game in which you control a cube. the directions for the cube are all messed. 

W should be forward

S should be back

A should be left

D should be right

but even I don't know what will happen. This game is still under development!

Future updates will include:

- puzzles

- level selector

- ability to choose the color of your cube

- more camera movement

Please drop any suggestions you have in the comments. Thanks for checking out Bad Cube!
